update PAGY_BASE_INFO
PAGY_SYS_NO = #{pagySysNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
PAGY_NAME = #{pagyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TPAM_PAGY_NO = #{tpamPagyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TPAM_PAGY_APP_ID = #{tpamPagyAppId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TPAM_PAGY_APP_VERSION = #{tpamPagyAppVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TPAM_PAGY_ACS_MODEL = #{tpamPagyAcsModel,jdbcType=CHAR},
TPAM_PAGY_SETL_MODEL = #{tpamPagySetlModel,jdbcType=CHAR},
TPAM_PAGY_REFUND_FLAG = #{tpamPagyRefundFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
TPAM_PAGY_REFUND_LIMIT_DATE = #{tpamPagyRefundLimitDate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

PAGY_SETL_TYPE = #{pagySetlType,jdbcType=CHAR},
PAGY_SETLTYPE_VALUE = #{pagySetltypeValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAGY_SETL_TM = #{pagySetlTm,jdbcType=CHAR},

PAGY_SETL_BANK_NO = #{pagySetlBankNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAGY_SETL_BANK_NM = #{pagySetlBankNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAGY_SETL_BANK_ADDR = #{pagySetlBankAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAGY_SETL_ACCT_NO = #{pagySetlAcctNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAGY_SETL_ACCT_NM = #{pagySetlAcctNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAGY_RATE_CODE = #{pagyRateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAGY_STATE = #{pagyState,jdbcType=CHAR},

CRT_TM = #{crtTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPD_TLR = #{lastUpdTlr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_UPD_TM = #{lastUpdTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where PAGY_NO = #{pagyNo,jdbcType=CHAR}
